title: GitHub Open Issues Analyzer
description: Analyze a GitHub repository and summarize all open issues with labels, titles, assignees, and short main problems.
example_prompt:
Analyze the GitHub repository at [REPO_URL] and list all open issues.

For each issue, provide:
- Labels
- Title
- Assignees
- Short main problem (3â€“6 words summary)
- URL and issue number

Output formats:
1. Markdown table with columns: Label | Title | Assignees | Main Problem
2. JSON

Include total number of open issues. Keep summaries short, clear, and readable.
example_result:
## Open Issues

Total open issues: 1

### Markdown Table

| Label       | Title   | Assignees  | Main Problem        |
|------------|---------|------------|---------------------|
| enhancement | Button | Unassigned | Button not showing  |

environmentVariables.name: GITHUB_PERSONAL_ACCESS_TOKEN
environmentVariables.description: GitHub personal access token with repo access
